RigIt the Web App for Rigging

17 February 2013

RigIt is a rigging web application that was built with jQuery Mobile and has offline browsing capabilities.


Try the demo - http://briannaja.github.com/Rigging-App/

First drilling on Mars

10 February 2013

To collect the sample, Curiosity used the drill at the end of its seven-foot robotic arm to make a hole in the bedrock.

NASA associate administrator John Grunsfeld says Curiosity is “Now a fully operating analytical laboratory on Mars,” calling the event the biggest milestone since the rover landed on...
